casebody.data:
[Cite as 01/28/2003 Case Announcements, 2003-Ohio-333.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

January 28, 2003

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2003-0154. State ex rel. Dapper v. Edwards.

In Mandamus. This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for a writ of mandamus. Upon consideration of relators’ motion for stay of demolition of home,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay be, and hereby is, denied.
